name: Parkour-0
description:
Parkour-0, a fun parkour game which is impossible to beat.

Made in 7 days for the XGJam with the Theme "Parkour" . 

Has Short yet impossible levels so try to complete the game in as little time as possible.                

Also this is my first game, so don't roast me in the comments.

Credits  Game Art:  Shaheer Kiani 3D Models:  Shaheer Kiani, Kenney's  Programming:  Shaheer Kiani Direction: Shaheer Kiani Game Design:  Shaheer Kiani Music: YouTube Non-Copyrighted Music
